description:
Chaos ensues when the bodies of four missing students are discovered murdered and positioned in grisly ways patterned after class topics. Kindaichi and Inspector Akechi collaborate by phone from their separate murder sites, but are stumped when everyone has an alibi. Will the Puppeteer from Hell have the last laugh?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 3
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 3
